name: Last Lost Roots
description:
Warning: Ending contains flashing images, be careful in case you are photosensitive.

Context: This game was developed during the "GlobalGameJam" of 2022. We spent 48 hours to develop the game.

Description: A top down action game about a man fighting hordes of treants using weapons he pulls from the ground. Beat the Giant Treant at the end to finish the game. Controls - Move the player with the W, A, S and D keys or the left joystick of a gamepad. - Pick up weapons by unrooting brown roots with the E key, the A button on an Xbox gamepad or the X button on a Playstation Gamepad. - Swing your weapon with the Left-Mouse button, the X button on an Xbox gamepad or the Square button on a Playstation Gamepad.

Game developed by:

  • Hendrik Provily 
  • Brent Vos
  • Bram Tseard
  • Nathan Doornbos
  • Hidde Zondervan

Fonts used:

  • 'Dhe font' by dhe fontana (https://www.dafont.com/dhe-wood.font?text=Last+Lost+Roots)

Afterword: There is an easter egg somewhere ;)
